sentence.Network_en: He becomes a pauper , and pauperism develops more rapidly than population and wealth.
sentence.Network_cn: 工人变成赤贫者,贫困比人口和财富增长得还要快.

sentence.Network_en: Their women and children suffer, and their old age is branded with pauperism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的妻儿受苦, 他们的晚年注定要依靠救济过活.

sentence.Network_en: There can be no communism with pauperism, or socialism with pauperism.
sentence.Network_cn: 不能有穷的共产主义,同样也不能有穷的社会主义.
